original_title: めくらのお市　地獄肌
overview: Oichi may have met her match as she vies against the evil beauty that has set her sights on destroying her. She must face numerous other challenges before confronting her greatest rival. While longing to live and love like other women, she realizes that she can never have a normal life, her sword which she holds on to like a security blanket will always come between her and such a life...
tagline: Longing to live and love like other women but compelled to remain a desperado
title: Trapped, the Crimson Bat
